fields.Title: How can we keep our mountains healthy?
fields.Publisher: Science Journal for Kids and Teens
fields.Author/Editor of larger work: Liesa Ziegler, Thea Weiss Hayes, Lindsay Martin
fields.Description/Abstract: This is an adaptation of a 2019 publication in the journal Earth's Future that I co-authored with the Mountain Sentinels Collaborative Network.  It is designed for use in middle school and lower high school classes about social science, biodiversity, and conservation.  It includes a glossary of key terms and study questions for the students, along with an answer key for teachers.  It is freely available to teachers and anyone else interested in using it.

attachments.filename: Mountain Sentinels Collaborative Network_2021_How can we keep our mountains healthy.pdf
